links.*: A Guide to Playing The Hobbit

wikitext.*:
'''David Elkan''' is a [[United Kingdom|British]] author. He wrote the book ''[[A Guide to Playing The Hobbit]]'', which guides and helps players of [[The Hobbit (1982 video game)|the video game adaptation of ''The Hobbit'']] through the game.
